sentences.sContent: And last but not least, people with whom you can build a rapport and camaraderie with.
sentences.sContent_eng: And last but not least, people with whom you can build a rapport and camaraderie with.
sentences.sCn: 一直到最后、并非最不重要的一个人，与你建立起和谐融洽的友谊。

synos.tran: 密切关系，交往；和谐一致

words.tran: 友好；恢复邦交；友善关系的建立
